it seems to be sync n sync every file BTW ext_drive is vfat, so permissions are a prob.  (tried unison)
- so you do get some transfer?
- what rsync command are you typing in?
- is Music capitalized? That may make a difference
- are you sure your external drive is mounted to /media/ext_drive/?
- how much music do you have, if you had to estimate? 10gb? 30gb?
- it sure may. considering that you are doing this by command line.
- how long does it take when you run your rsync script?

- between the 1st and 2nd time you ran the rsync command, did you make a lot of changes to your music? Becuase any changes you make (modification times, renaming folders, etc) will be re-copied when you run rsync again

- it'll by nature sync everything again, but it shouldn't take DAYS to go. I run an rsync script which syncs data across 4 SATA hard drives in my system... it takes about a minute to run the script if nothing major was changed
- what was your rsync command again?
- now wiat... do you run 1 command for each directory of music? Or do you run 1 command for ALL music?
